item.description:
Herb is throwing a unique Halloween party! This will be a great alternative to the crowded and loud parties being held at bars and clubs. Herbâ€™s party will be fun, with a quiet and intimate setting where you have a chance to have a conversation with the people around you. Instead of bar drinks, enjoy lots of candy and junk food (the true spirit of the holiday).

Herb encourages people to come dressed as their Enneagram Type, the type you want to be, or wear a costume from the dark side! The party is also a potluck so if you can please bring a vegetarian dish/snack or candy! Costumes and potluck items are optional, but there is a $10.00 cover charge (which is much less than what other events are charging). The party goes from 7:00 - 11:00 so feel free to come and go whenever you want.

Herb is open to answering questions about the Enneagram during the party, particularly typing ghosts, vampires, monsters and other haunted visitors (both visible and invisible).
item.name: Unique Halloween Party
